original_text: When God destroyed the cities of the valley, he saved Lot from that punishment. God remembered what Abraham had asked him. He took Lot away from the cities where he had lived. Then God destroyed those cities.
korean_text: 하나님이 그 지역의 성을 멸하실 때 곧 롯이 거주하는 성을 엎으실 때에 하나님이 아브라함을 생각하사 롯을 그 엎으시는 중에서 내보내셨더라

sentences.original_text: When God destroyed the cities of the valley
he saved Lot from that punishment
God remembered what Abraham had asked him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 아브라함이 자기에게 요청했던 것을 기억했다

sentences.original_text: He took Lot away from the cities
